articles.description: Nathan Jones spent nine difficult months at Stoke City in 2019
articles.content:
Nathan Jones is popular enough again back at Luton Town to refer to himself when he was asked about Alex Neil leaving Sunderland to become the new manager at Stoke City.
Neil had worked wonders in t… [+3249 chars]
